amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for land conservation partnerships authorized by the Highlands Conservation Act by $2,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 111-184 to increase funding for land conservation partnerships authorized by the Highlands Conservation Act by $2,000,000 and reduce funding for construction, repair, improvement, extension, alteration, and purchase of fixed equipment or facilities of, or for use by, the Environmental Protection Agency by $2,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
